casebody.data:
First Department,

October, 1959

(October 1, 1959) In the Matter of the Arbitration between Compagnie Europeene De Participations Industrielles (C. E. P. I.) et al. and Albert Flegenheimer.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied, with $10 costs. Concur — Botein, P. J., Breitel, Babin, Stevens and Bergan, JJ.
